programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure) S1 (6/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure»Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework»Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et les pancakes) S1 (1/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et les pancakes»Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma cousine Chloé) S1 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Ma cousine Chloé»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les crêpes) S1 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Les crêpes»Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Les Amis du goût) S5 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Les Amis du goût»When Chefs Molly and Gil bring their tasty food truck to Bland Land, they discover that the Baron von Bland only lets his subjects eat Bland Bread! Yuck! The Chefs must find a way to bring taste to the kingdom!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue a une bonne nouvelle) S1 (3/17)
programme.desc: «Blue a une bonne nouvelle»Blue has something exciting to tell everybody! In this game of Blue's Clues, Josh and the viewer go on a note finding quest, solving riddles, and following treasure maps to find out the answer to Blue's Big News.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le livre de Blue) S1 (4/17)
programme.desc: «Le livre de Blue»We are reading Blue's Clues to figure out what book Blue wants to read for story time. While looking for clues we practice letter recognition and sound, help Mr. Salt & Mrs. Pepper with their grocery list and skidoo into a book!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Finceañera) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Finceañera»Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Lorelai's Bracelet) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Lorelai's Bracelet»Bonnie steals Lorelai's bracelet, turning herself into a mermaid and while trapping Lorelai in human form!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William Manta: News Fish) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «William Manta: News Fish»While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Lost Jelly) S1 (24/28)
programme.desc: «The Lost Jelly»When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Que les jeux commencent / La journée du sport) S3 (17/26)
programme.desc: «Que les jeux commencent / La journée du sport»It's sports day and especially for Everest, Ryder and the puppies are building a snow ramp. And that in the middle of summer!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington fait le clown) S2 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington fait le clown»Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les jeux de plein air) S4 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Les jeux de plein air»Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (En bateau) S4 (43/52)
programme.desc: «En bateau»Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de porcelaine) S4 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de porcelaine»While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Apple Picking) S1 (n°49)
programme.desc: «Apple Picking»The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Talking Flower) S1 (n°50)
programme.desc: «The Talking Flower»Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La crise de rire de Magenta) S3 (n°15)
programme.desc: «La crise de rire de Magenta»Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one "patient" seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater / Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile) S8 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater / Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile»The Pups rescue Francois from a water tower geyser. // The Pups rescue a baby anteater stuck on a bucking RoboHorse. // The Pups rescue Ace and her special delivery for Chickaletta's party. // The Pups rescue Mr. Porter and his stranded Food Truck.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Chien-Robot, le dépanneur) S3 (8/26)
programme.desc: «Chien-Robot, le dépanneur»RoboDog's wiring gets mixed up, and he goes on a fixing rampage around Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle) S2 (n°213)
programme.desc: «Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle»Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots) S1 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots»A meteor hits Earth and Mister Steel's heroic demeanor forces Deer Squad to save everyone. A dance competition in Middenbos turns into a mess.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry) S1 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry»Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned...

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby Shark, le maire / Coule ou flotte) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Baby Shark, le maire / Coule ou flotte»The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (A Tail Of Two Fathers) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «A Tail Of Two Fathers»It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Present for Ron) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «A Present for Ron»Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Strawberries) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Strawberries»Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Amazing Guesser) S1 (n°51)
programme.desc: «The Amazing Guesser»After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! Christopher utilizes the help of Bubu and Ron to surprise the surprisers when they wake up!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Robot Player) S1 (n°52)
programme.desc: «The Robot Player»Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Longchair for Ron) S1 (n°68)
programme.desc: «A Longchair for Ron»A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Key) S1 (n°69)
programme.desc: «The Key»Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special "dinosaur" juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le ballon de George) S4 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Le ballon de George»Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le hoquet) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le hoquet»George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vélos) S1 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Les vélos»Daddy Pig has grown a large pumpkin. Peppa is cycling, but she wants to cycle without training wheels so she bumps accidentaly into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course au trophée) S5 (3/20)
programme.desc: «La course au trophée»Crusher wants the trophy of the Championship race. But apparently Crusher hasn't yet learned that you have to earn a trophy first.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Maitriser la force) S1 (3/20)
programme.desc: «Maitriser la force»"When Starla the friendly cowgirl truck loses one of her pistons, Blaze and AJ set out to get it back. But they'll have to hurry before Crusher gets his greedy tires on it!".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les ours polaires / Un costume sur mesure) S3 (11/26)
programme.desc: «Les ours polaires / Un costume sur mesure»When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Al's pasture, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le robot-saure / Le festival de cinéma) S3 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Le robot-saure / Le festival de cinéma»The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal»After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates. // Rammy wants to win the city marathon but he cannot keep up with Sir Steel's super sneakers!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Muffin In Space) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Muffin In Space»Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure) S1 (6/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure»Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.desc: «Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework»Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.desc: «Pas très bien»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le château aux 4 vents) S1 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Le château aux 4 vents»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma cousine Chloé) S1 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Ma cousine Chloé»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.desc: «Les crêpes»Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Les Amis du goût) S5 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Les Amis du goût»When Chefs Molly and Gil bring their tasty food truck to Bland Land, they discover that the Baron von Bland only lets his subjects eat Bland Bread! Yuck! The Chefs must find a way to bring taste to the kingdom!

programme.desc: «Blue a une bonne nouvelle»Blue has something exciting to tell everybody! In this game of Blue's Clues, Josh and the viewer go on a note finding quest, solving riddles, and following treasure maps to find out the answer to Blue's Big News.

programme.desc: «Le livre de Blue»We are reading Blue's Clues to figure out what book Blue wants to read for story time. While looking for clues we practice letter recognition and sound, help Mr. Salt & Mrs. Pepper with their grocery list and skidoo into a book!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Finceañera) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Finceañera»Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Lorelai's Bracelet) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Lorelai's Bracelet»Bonnie steals Lorelai's bracelet, turning herself into a mermaid and while trapping Lorelai in human form!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William Manta: News Fish) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «William Manta: News Fish»While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Lost Jelly) S1 (24/28)
programme.desc: «The Lost Jelly»When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Que les jeux commencent / La journée du sport) S3 (17/26)
programme.desc: «Que les jeux commencent / La journée du sport»It's sports day and especially for Everest, Ryder and the puppies are building a snow ramp. And that in the middle of summer!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington fait le clown) S2 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington fait le clown»Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les flaques de boue) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Les flaques de boue»It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go outside. When the rain stops, Peppa and George get to play one of their favourite games - jumping in muddy puddles! Things get very muddy indeed when Mummy and Daddy Pig join in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (A la recherche de Mr. Dinosaure) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «A la recherche de Mr. Dinosaure»George's favorite cuddly toy is Mr. Dinosaur. One day Mr. Dinosaur gets stuck in a tree. George thinks he's lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma meilleure amie) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Ma meilleure amie»George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Smile Day) S1 (n°53)
programme.desc: «Smile Day»When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (No Panic !) S1 (n°54)
programme.desc: «No Panic !»Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon) S3 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon»Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La pierre de l'espace / Le maire adjoint) S4 (17/26)
programme.desc: «La pierre de l'espace / Le maire adjoint»Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace) S2 (n°214)
programme.desc: «Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf»Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge) S1 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge»Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Captain Varech / Riquiqui le Tardigrade) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Captain Varech / Riquiqui le Tardigrade»As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Best Friends Game) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «The Best Friends Game»When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Trip to the Moon) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «The Trip to the Moon»Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Swing) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «The Swing»When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Magic Trick) S1 (n°57)
programme.desc: «The Magic Trick»Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! Christopher is transformed into a balloon and the balloon into Froga!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Go Find it!) S1 (n°58)
programme.desc: «Go Find it!»Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fruits Surprise) S1 (n°70)
programme.desc: «Fruits Surprise»When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's New Blue Jeans) S1 (n°71)
programme.desc: «Bubu's New Blue Jeans»Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Maman Pig travaille) S1 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Maman Pig travaille»Peppa accidentally crashes Mama Pig's computer. Papa Pig is trying to get it right.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cochon du milieu) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Le cochon du milieu»Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La boîte à secrets) S1 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La boîte à secrets»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cerf-volant) S1 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le cerf-volant»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les Héros du baby-sitting) S5 (4/20)
programme.desc: «Les Héros du baby-sitting»Blaze and his driver AJ are best friends. They arrive in Axle City where Crusher wants to win the race for the world championship by cheating. Blaze and AJ do everything they can to stop and defeat Crusher.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Gâteau-strophe !) S1 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Gâteau-strophe !»"When a hungry Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck's baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away! It's up to AJ and Blaze to track down all the rampaging robots before Axle City is blanketed in baked goods.".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Ballon dirigeable / Le Concours du Meilleur Chili) S4 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Le Ballon dirigeable / Le Concours du Meilleur Chili»Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La partie de cache-cache / Des bébêtes en vadrouille) S4 (3/26)
programme.desc: «La partie de cache-cache / Des bébêtes en vadrouille»The dragon from Alex's favourite book comes to life and plays hide and seek in Adventure Bay. Alex can help get him back. Francois's trailer detaches and all of his reptiles and amphibians escape from their cage.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique»Mr. Steel wants to go to the moon and orders Professor Sketch to turn the Steel Tower into a rocket! A magician lures the audience away from Rammy's presentation, who gets so angry that he takes it out on the man's hat.
